Title: Silverlight Library 1.0
Description: Silverlight Library ia a collection of useful classes to help Silverlight 2.0 developers.
HomeWiki:
Silverlight Library
Silverlight Library ia a collection of useful classes to help Silverlight 2.0 developers.

NOTE: SUPPORT SILVERLIGHT 2.0 RTW

Current features:
  • CollectionViewSource control (http://blog.boschin.it/articles/Improving-Silverlight-2.0-databinding-with-a-CollectionViewSource-control.aspx)
  • RadialPanel control (http://blog.boschin.it/articles/silverlight-radialpanel.aspx)
  • DockPanel. The behavior of this control is the same of the WPF DockPanel

download the latest release Silverlight Library 1.0.3093.1

Old project

The previous project Silverlight Playground 1.0 has been discontinued. You can still download source code from the "Source Code" tab in codeplex.
